Service Details: - Collects and ships bicycles to developing countries - Works to increase people's mobility and thereby increase their accessibility to education, health care, social services, and income generating activities - Only functioning, adult sized mountain bikes or mountain bike parts are accepted
Cost: - Cost to ship a bicycle is about $30 - If you do not have a bike to donate, please help cover the cost of one or more bicycles through a cash donation - Cash donations may be made at any Interior Savings Credit Union or at St. Charles Garnier Parish on Benvoulin Rd next door to the Father Pandosy Mission
Address & Map: 3645 Benvoulin RdKelowna, BC     V1W 4M7View MapQuest Map
